sentences.sContent: So who are your real friends and whose real friends are you?
sentences.sCn: 而谁是你的真正的朋友，你又是谁的真正的朋友呢？

sentences.sContent: That’s the man whose house has burned down. ＃
sentences.sCn: 就是那个男人的房子被烧毁了。

trans.tranOther: used to ask which person or people a particular thing belongs to
